trans-unit.source: Composition brushes
trans-unit.target: Composition brushes

trans-unit.source: A brush paints the area of a Visual with its output.
trans-unit.target: A brush paints the area of a Visual with its output.

trans-unit.source: Different brushes have different types of output.
trans-unit.target: Different brushes have different types of output.

trans-unit.source: Composition brushes
trans-unit.target: Composition brushes

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: A brush paints the area of a [**Visual**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706858) with its output.
trans-unit.target: A brush paints the area of a [**Visual**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706858) with its output.

trans-unit.source: Different brushes have different types of output.
trans-unit.target: Different brushes have different types of output.

trans-unit.source: The Composition API provides three brush types:
trans-unit.target: The Composition API provides three brush types:

trans-unit.source: [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) paints a visual with a solid color
trans-unit.target: [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) paints a visual with a solid color

trans-unit.source: [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) paints a visual with the contents of a composition surface
trans-unit.target: [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) paints a visual with the contents of a composition surface

trans-unit.source: [**CompositionEffectBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589406) paints a visual with the contents of a composition effect
trans-unit.target: [**CompositionEffectBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589406) paints a visual with the contents of a composition effect

trans-unit.source: All brushes inherit from [**CompositionBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589398); they are created directly or indirectly by the [**Compositor**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706789) and are device-independent resources.
trans-unit.target: All brushes inherit from [**CompositionBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589398); they are created directly or indirectly by the [**Compositor**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706789) and are device-independent resources.

trans-unit.source: Although brushes are device-independent, [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) and [**CompositionEffectBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589406) paint a [**Visual**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706858) with contents from a composition surface which are device-dependent.
trans-unit.target: Although brushes are device-independent, [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) and [**CompositionEffectBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589406) paint a [**Visual**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706858) with contents from a composition surface which are device-dependent.

trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.target: Color Basics

trans-unit.target: Alpha Modes

trans-unit.target: Using Color Brush

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This overview assumes that you are familiar with the structure of a basic Composition application, as described in [Composition UI](visual-layer.md).
trans-unit.target: This overview assumes that you are familiar with the structure of a basic Composition application, as described in [Composition UI](visual-layer.md).

trans-unit.source: Color Basics
trans-unit.target: Color Basics

trans-unit.source: Before you paint with a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399), you need to choose colors.
trans-unit.target: Before you paint with a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399), you need to choose colors.

trans-unit.source: The Composition API uses the Windows Runtime structure, Color, to represent a color.
trans-unit.target: The Composition API uses the Windows Runtime structure, Color, to represent a color.

trans-unit.source: The Color structure uses sRGB encoding.
trans-unit.target: The Color structure uses sRGB encoding.

trans-unit.source: sRGB encoding divides colors into four channels: alpha, red, green, and blue.
trans-unit.target: sRGB encoding divides colors into four channels: alpha, red, green, and blue.

trans-unit.source: Each component is represented by a floating point value with a normal range of 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Each component is represented by a floating point value with a normal range of 0.0 to 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 indicates the complete absence of that color, while a value of 1.0 indicates that the color is fully present.
trans-unit.target: A value of 0.0 indicates the complete absence of that color, while a value of 1.0 indicates that the color is fully present.

trans-unit.source: For the alpha component, 0.0 represents a fully transparent color and 1.0 represents a fully opaque color.
trans-unit.target: For the alpha component, 0.0 represents a fully transparent color and 1.0 represents a fully opaque color.

trans-unit.source: Alpha Modes
trans-unit.target: Alpha Modes

trans-unit.source: Color values in [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) are always interpreted as straight alpha.
trans-unit.target: Color values in [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) are always interpreted as straight alpha.

trans-unit.source: Using Color Brush
trans-unit.target: Using Color Brush

trans-unit.source: To create a color brush, call the Compositor.[**CreateColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositor.createcolorbrush.aspx) method, which returns a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399).
trans-unit.target: To create a color brush, call the Compositor.[**CreateColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositor.createcolorbrush.aspx) method, which returns a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399).

trans-unit.source: The default color for **CompositionColorBrush** is \#00000000.
trans-unit.target: The default color for **CompositionColorBrush** is \#00000000.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration and code shows a small visual tree to create a rectangle that is stroked with a black color brush and painted with a solid color brush that has the color value of 0x9ACD32.
trans-unit.target: The following illustration and code shows a small visual tree to create a rectangle that is stroked with a black color brush and painted with a solid color brush that has the color value of 0x9ACD32.

trans-unit.source: CompositionColorBrush
trans-unit.target: CompositionColorBrush

trans-unit.source: Unlike other brushes, creating a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) is a relatively inexpensive operation.
trans-unit.target: Unlike other brushes, creating a [**CompositionColorBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589399) is a relatively inexpensive operation.

trans-unit.source: You may create **CompositionColorBrush** objects each time you render with little to no performance impact.
trans-unit.target: You may create **CompositionColorBrush** objects each time you render with little to no performance impact.

trans-unit.source: Using Surface Brush
trans-unit.target: Using Surface Brush

trans-unit.source: A [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) paints a visual with a composition surface (represented by a [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) object).
trans-unit.target: A [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) paints a visual with a composition surface (represented by a [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) object).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a square visual painted with a bitmap of licorice rendered onto a **ICompositionSurface** using D2D.
trans-unit.target: The following illustration shows a square visual painted with a bitmap of licorice rendered onto a **ICompositionSurface** using D2D.

trans-unit.source: CompositionSurfaceBrush](images/composition-compositionsurfacebrush.png) The first example initializes a composition surface for use with the brush.
trans-unit.target: CompositionSurfaceBrush](images/composition-compositionsurfacebrush.png) The first example initializes a composition surface for use with the brush.

trans-unit.source: The composition surface is created using a helper method, LoadImage that takes in a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) and a Url as a string.
trans-unit.target: The composition surface is created using a helper method, LoadImage that takes in a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) and a Url as a string.

trans-unit.source: It loads the image from the Url, renders the image onto a [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) and sets the surface as content of the **CompositionSurfaceBrush**.
trans-unit.target: It loads the image from the Url, renders the image onto a [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) and sets the surface as content of the **CompositionSurfaceBrush**.

trans-unit.source: Note, **ICompositionSurface** is exposed in Native code only, hence LoadImage method is implemented in native code.
trans-unit.target: Note, **ICompositionSurface** is exposed in Native code only, hence LoadImage method is implemented in native code.

trans-unit.source: To create the surface brush, call the Compositor.[**CreateSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositor.createsurfacebrush.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: To create the surface brush, call the Compositor.[**CreateSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositor.createsurfacebrush.aspx) method.

trans-unit.source: The method returns a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) object.
trans-unit.target: The method returns a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) object.

trans-unit.source: The code below illustrates the code that can be used to paint a visual with contents of a **CompositionSurfaceBrush**.
trans-unit.target: The code below illustrates the code that can be used to paint a visual with contents of a **CompositionSurfaceBrush**.

trans-unit.source: Configuring Stretch and Alignment
trans-unit.target: Configuring Stretch and Alignment

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, the contents of the [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) for a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) doesn’t completely fill the areas of the visual that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes, the contents of the [**ICompositionSurface**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706819) for a [**CompositionSurfaceBrush**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt589415) doesn’t completely fill the areas of the visual that is being painted.

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the Composition API uses the brush’s [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx), [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) and [**Stretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.stretch) mode settings to determine how to fill the remaining area.
trans-unit.target: When this happens, the Composition API uses the brush’s [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx), [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) and [**Stretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.stretch) mode settings to determine how to fill the remaining area.

trans-unit.source: [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx) and [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) are of type float and can be used to control the positioning of the brush inside the visual bounds.
trans-unit.target: [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx) and [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) are of type float and can be used to control the positioning of the brush inside the visual bounds.

trans-unit.source: Value 0.0 aligns the left/top corner of the brush with the left/top corner of the visual
trans-unit.target: Value 0.0 aligns the left/top corner of the brush with the left/top corner of the visual

trans-unit.source: Value of 0.5 aligns the center of the brush with the center of the visual
trans-unit.target: Value of 0.5 aligns the center of the brush with the center of the visual

trans-unit.source: Value of 1.0 aligns the right/bottom corner of the brush with the right/bottom corner of the visual
trans-unit.target: Value of 1.0 aligns the right/bottom corner of the brush with the right/bottom corner of the visual

trans-unit.source: The [**Stretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.stretch) property accepts these values, which the [**CompositionStretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706786) enumeration defines:
trans-unit.target: The [**Stretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.stretch) property accepts these values, which the [**CompositionStretch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn706786) enumeration defines:

trans-unit.source: None: The brush doesn't stretch to fill the visual bounds.
trans-unit.target: None: The brush doesn't stretch to fill the visual bounds.

trans-unit.source: Be careful with this Stretch setting: if the brush is larger than the visual bounds, the contents of the brush will be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Be careful with this Stretch setting: if the brush is larger than the visual bounds, the contents of the brush will be clipped.

trans-unit.source: The portion of brush used to paint the visual bounds can be controlled by using the [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx) and [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) properties.
trans-unit.target: The portion of brush used to paint the visual bounds can be controlled by using the [**HorizontalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.horizontalalignmentratio.aspx) and [**VerticalAlignmentRatio**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.composition.compositionsurfacebrush.verticalalignmentratio) properties.

trans-unit.source: Uniform: The brush is scaled to fit the visual bounds; the aspect ratio of the brush is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Uniform: The brush is scaled to fit the visual bounds; the aspect ratio of the brush is preserved.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: This is the default value.

trans-unit.source: UniformToFill: The brush is scaled so that it completely fills the visual bounds; the aspect ratio of the brush is preserved.
trans-unit.target: UniformToFill: The brush is scaled so that it completely fills the visual bounds; the aspect ratio of the brush is preserved.

trans-unit.source: Fill: The brush is scaled to fit the visual bounds.
trans-unit.target: Fill: The brush is scaled to fit the visual bounds.

trans-unit.source: Because the brush’s height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the brush might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: Because the brush’s height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the brush might not be preserved.

trans-unit.source: That is, the brush might be distorted to completely fill the visual bounds.
trans-unit.target: That is, the brush might be distorted to completely fill the visual bounds.
